You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Gscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4A2.
  * `&gscr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/210a/index.htm U+0210A].
